node.title: Bynder
node.description: The Bynder Image Selector allows to search images in Bynder DAM and use them in your website.

node.title: Cloudinary
node.description: The Cloudinary Image Selector allows to search images in Cloudinary DAM and use them in your project.

node.title: Magento
node.description: The Magento product selector is a selector connected to Magento instance which allows users to search and select a product from the Magento product catalog.

node.title: SendPulse
node.description: The SendPulse Mailing List Selector allows you to retrieve mailing lists from SendPulse.

node.title: Shopify
node.description: Shopify product selector is a selector connected to Shopify Storefront which allows users to search and select a product from Shopify product catalog.

node.title: commercetools
node.description: commercetools product selector is a selector which allows users to search and select a product from their product catalog in commercetools.

node.title: Ace Code Editor (Syntax Highlighter)
node.description: This custom element is an editable text area enhanced by the Ace Code Editor to provide a programmer-friendly environment for writing code examples. Offers a fine selection of programming languages to be highlighted.

node.title: Algolia
node.description: Build a powerful search for your project using Algolia and Kentico Kontent.

node.title: Bynder
node.description: Upload, browse, and link your Bynder assets from Kontent.

node.title: CKEditor 4
node.description: This custom element is based on the CKEditor 4 WYSIWYG text editor.

node.title: Change type
node.description: Change the type of the item by mapping its content to a new item of the target type.

node.title: Color Picker
node.description: The Color picker allows user to choose a color from palette and sets it as a HEX string, e.g. '#ff0000' for red color, '#00ff00' for green, etc.

node.title: Content Insights
node.description: The Content Insights Element analyzes content from text and rich text elements and enriches your content with new content properties like reading time, readability score, sentiment, and configurable number of keywords. On top of that, the custom element offers suggestions on how to improve your content.

node.title: Content types selector
node.description: This custom element for Kentico Kontent gives editors a way to select content types from current project

node.title: Country State Selector
node.description: The Country and State selector is a drop down selector which allows users to select country and state (if country has any).

node.title: Crystallize
node.description: This custom element lets editors link products from their Crystallize PIM with their content.

node.title: Crystallize
node.description: The Crystallize product selector is a selector which allows users to search and select a product from Crystallize product catalog.

node.title: Date Picker
node.description: This is a simple calendar control based on jQuery UI DatePicker which lets you pick a date.

node.title: Deep clone
node.description: Create a deep clone of the item, cloning every linked descendant.

node.title: Flickr
node.description: <string>The Flickr image selector</string? allows you to search images on Flickr and select one. NOTE: Selected image may be subject to copyright and/or usage restrictions.

node.title: Font Awesome Icon SVG Selector
node.description: Custom element allowing to pick Font Awesome icon. Custom element stores the value as icon's SVG.

node.title: Font Awesome Icon codename selector
node.description: Custom element allowing to pick <strong>Font Awesome icon</string>. Custom element stores the value as icon's codename.

node.title: Font Awesome icon
node.description: This extension lets you search for any icon in Font Awesome's regular set of icons. It stores metadata and SVG of icon.

node.title: Formsite Forms
node.description: The Formsite Form selector allows to retrieve created forms in Formsite and use them on your website.

node.title: Geolocation Leaflet
node.description: This custom element allows you to put a marker on a map and it automatically gets converted to latitude and longitude geo locations.

node.title: Giphy
node.description: The Giphy Selector allows you to search images on Giphy and select one.

node.title: Google Places
node.description: This is a custom element for Kentico Kontent that allows users to easily get the geo-coordinates for a location using the Google Places API.

node.title: Google geolocation
node.description: This custom element let's you pick and save an exact geolocation through Google maps.

node.title: HSL Color
node.description: This custom element lets editors define the hue, saturation, and lightness of a selected color.

node.title: HTML Inputs
node.description: This is a custom element for Kentico Kontent that allows you to define a group of HTML inputs that your editors can fill out one or more times. You can combine any number of HTML5 inputs into a single element -> text, textarea, color, date, time, number, radio, checkbox, password and range.

node.title: HubSpot forms
node.description: Integrate with HubSpot and link your content with a selected HubSpot form (with preview)

node.title: Image transformer
node.description: This custom element allows an editor to apply the Image Transformation API to any selected image.

node.title: Item selector
node.description: This element offers items from another project to be linked with your item

node.title: Item synchronizer
node.description: This element allows you to sync items from one project to another

node.title: Keyword Extractor
node.description: This custom element gives you a way to automatically generate keywords for an item based on the content in it.

node.title: Link checker
node.description: This custom element gets all links from all rich text elements on your item and checks whether they are live or not.

node.title: List
node.description: This custom element lets editors create a list of text elements.

node.title: Quill Rich Text Editor
node.description: This custom element is based on the Quill rich text editor. It stores content in JSON format, so it's omni-channel friendly.

node.title: SVG Icon Selector
node.description: This is a custom element for Kentico Kontent that allows users to select an SVG icon from a list of provided icons.

node.title: Shopify
node.description: Browse and link your Shopify products into your content.

node.title: SimpleMDE (Markdown Editor)
node.description: SimpleMDE is a markdown editor which allows users to write formatted text. In this sample element, you can find examples of setting dynamic height and reacting on the window ‘resize’ events. When the element is disabled, the editor is set to the read-only mode.

node.title: Summernote Rich Text Editor
node.description: This custom element is based on the Summernote rich text editor. It allows you to switch to the Source code mode to edit or see the HTML markup!

node.title: TinyMCE Rich Text Editor
node.description: This custom element is based on the TinyMCE WYSIWYG text editor.

node.title: Toast UI Editor
node.description: This custom element is based on Toast UI Editor. It is a Markdown WYSIWYG Editor including GFM Standard + Chart & UML Extensible.

node.title: Toggle Switch
node.description: This custom element provides a simple on/off toggle switch.

node.title: Unique Textbox
node.description: This custom element checks whether your entered value is unique across all items in your project in specified element.

node.title: Unsplash
node.description: This custom element lets editors link free assets from Unsplash to their content.

node.title: Unsplash
node.description: This is a custom element for Kentico Kontent that allows users to search and select high-quality, royalty-free images from Unsplash.

node.title: Vimeo preview
node.description: This custom element lets you to add and preview a Vimeo video. It extracts and stores the video id so it can later be used in the app.

node.title: Wistia video
node.description: Link your selected Wistia videos with your content through this custom element.

node.title: YouTube preview
node.description: This custom element allows you to add various types of Youtube video URL, it extracts and stores the video id for your apps and shows the video.

node.title: YouTube video
node.description: Link your selected Youtube video with your content through this custom element.
